name: Onirica
description:
In this dungeon crawler, you play as Gregor in a quest inside his dreams. There, you'll need to find the strength within yourself to fight your fear and run from your own mind's creations.

 

Stuck in a grim prison of the mind, the objective of the game is to reach the end of the level before being consumed by FEAR. But for that you will need to find the key that unlocks your true self.

As you go about in an unknown place, you will see your FEAR level increase. When you cross a mirror, your demons will appear from there to hunt you down and you will start to PANIC. Keep them at a distance or you will see your FEAR grow faster as your PANIC level rises to the top.

When your FEAR level reaches 50%, STRESS kicks in and you might even see yourself having trouble moving.

 

And remember: “It is not real”…

 

 ... or is it?

 

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 by:

 

André Barbosa (zadesofspades - https://zadesofspades.itch.io/ )
